short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A stunning display of the northern lights

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Aurora Winter Escape" background features a vibrant aurora borealis under a clear night sky, set above a snowy winter landscape. Ideal for clock and weather displays, as well as shortcuts, it provides a calming and visually stunning interface with a nighttime.
